channel.title: For anyone who has a motorola SGB*00 cable modem router
channel.description:
In this tut Ill teach you how to obtain a new ip address on your sgb900/500/400/any other one in that line of modem.
step 1: remove all power from the modem/router
step 2: disconnect the cable, cable from the modem (modem)
step 3: wait 10 seconds, plug back in the cable, cable and make sure it is screwed in propley
step 4: re connect the power and enjoy you now have a differnt ip address.
its that simple ;D

@jcs_double wrote:

ye is kinda only for people who have a bigpond cable connection im not sure other isps will let you do it but this sort of what it said to do in the manual
